root.name: Painting
root.description: Creates an overlay on which you can draw. This can also be used to generate specific data (for tests).
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2014-03-14 15:52:13
* fixed issues when used on Canvas3D. * better memory release scheme. * others minors improvements.
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-11-27 14:51:55
* compatible with Icy last version
- Version 1.3.3.0 Date 2013-06-27 17:44:49
* corrected recent null pointer issue.
- Version 1.3.2.1 Date 2013-06-12 15:04:43
* correct .jar
- Version 1.3.2.0 Date 2013-06-12 15:00:37
Removed a dependency on Micro Manager
- Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2013-02-19 16:25:13
* corrected issue with data modification
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2013-02-19 15:19:01
* Now can select specific channels when altering the data.
- Version 1.2.1.2 Date 2013-02-15 15:34:11
* Painting is not available for 3D
- Version 1.2.1.1 Date 2013-02-13 10:57:51
* issue with compilation corrected.
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2013-02-13 10:01:24
* corrected issue with an imageicon.
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2013-02-07 11:53:02
* corrected issue with pen width * changed the way the plugin works : as long as the Painting tools are visible, sequences become editable.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-06-01 13:34:41
Feature: it is possible to alter the data directly. Be careful !
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-04-26 14:26:50
New version only for minimum kernel version requirements and version number.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-04-26 14:24:55
